English.title: ğŸ… Theory of Change Tomato Harvest Game
English.intro: Grow your tomato plant by answering questions about the Theory of Change! Each correct answer advances your plant to the next stage, leading to a bountiful harvest. Enter your name to appear on the leaderboard, and play as many times as you like. You can change the language at any time using the sidebar. If you need more information or examples about the Theory of Change, visit the 'Home' menu of the app.
English.name_prompt: Enter your name (or leave blank for 'Tomato Farmer'):
English.question_instruction: Choose the correct answer to advance your plant.
English.congrats: ğŸ‰ Congratulations! You've harvested your tomatoes.
English.fail_message: Oh no! That wasn't an agroecological practice. Your plant couldn't reach the harvest this time.
English.correct_feedback: Great! That's an agroecological choice. Your plant grows stronger.

Swahili.title: ğŸ… Mchezo wa Mavuno ya Nyanya na Nadharia ya Mabadiliko
Swahili.intro: Kuza mmea wako wa nyanya kwa kujibu maswali kuhusu Nadharia ya Mabadiliko! Kila jibu sahihi linakua mmea hadi upate mavuno mengi. Andika jina lako ili uonekane kwenye ubao wa matokeo, na unaweza kucheza mara nyingi unavyopenda. Unaweza kubadilisha lugha wakati wowote kupitia upande wa menyu. Ukihitaji maelezo zaidi au mifano kuhusu Nadharia ya Mabadiliko, tembelea menyu ya 'Nyumbani' ya app.
Swahili.name_prompt: Andika jina lako (au acha wazi kwa 'Mkulima wa Nyanya'):
Swahili.question_instruction: Chagua jibu sahihi ili mmea wako ukue.
Swahili.fail_message: Samahani! Hiyo haikuwa mbinu ya kilimo hai. Mmea wako haukufanikiwa kufikia mavuno safari hii.
Swahili.correct_feedback: Vizuri sana! Hilo ni chaguo la kilimo hai. Mmea wako unakuwa imara zaidi.

0.desc: Udongo wenye afya uko tayariâ€”safari yako ya kilimo hai inaanza.

2.desc: Wazo lako limeota mizizi, miche inatokea.

3.desc: Mizizi inaenda chini na mpango wako unazidi kuimarika.
